title: Care Blitzcrank mia bot.
body: 5 seconds later he is in top lane ganking.

replies.body: He didn't have teleport, he just ran there with homeguard, mobility, Righteous, W, Talisman and Support masteries.

because righteous would have an actual effect with no near by enemies, sure sure m8
and his w applies a slow to him after like 3 or 4 sec

He still gets there in like 5 seconds. The point is he is on you in about 0.2 seconds, even if he uses Ascension, then W then righteous just as hes near you in lane, he's still on you instantly after going b.

Plus he has a grab for if you flash and can just chase you down. He's like the King of ganking.
Blitz with the almost 600 move speed mia GG
